department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Printed Matters: Studio Course
course.description: Painting's productive association with the technologies of reproduction. We will think both pre- and post-20th century, considering the analogue (intaglio printing, especially etching and aquatint; also block, book and commercial printing) and digital as worthy collaborators. Workshops in technique will support independent projects in any media.
course.prerequisites: At least one VES studio half-course or the permisson of the instructor.
course.notes: The first meeting of this class will be Tuesday, Sept. 2 at 1pm to 2pm.
